Author: mole99
Content: For future shuttles, yes. Otherwise it won't be possible to get more of the smaller slot sizes.

Author: mithro_

Author: mole99
Content: Even for this shuttle I was thinking we cut the dies in the correct size.

Author: mole99
Content: I'm not sure how the bonding works if you need to go across half the die.

Author: mithro_
Content: Yeah

Author: mole99
Content: Probably it wouldn't work, because the bond wires would touch the die.

Author: mole99
Content: Started a thread.

Author: mole99
Content: So yes, we need to cut the green lines to get the correct die size.

Author: mole99
Content: @Andrew Wingate It's a good preparation for the next shuttle, where we might want to add another cut here.

Author: mole99
Content:
By the way @Andrew Wingate, when you have the time, could you also create CoB PCBs for the other slot sizes?

You can find the pad assignments here: https://github.com/wafer-space/gf180mcu-project-template/tree/main/librelane/slots
If you want to take a look at the GDS, you can download it at the bottom of each CI run: https://github.com/wafer-space/gf180mcu-project-template/actions/runs/20094869649
(Can be opened with [KLayout](https://www.klayout.de/).)

Let me know if you have any questions.
